spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatches. (E1) The large DECK/terrace along the top edge in the 2D plan is not modeled in the 3D render (replaced by solid exterior wall). (E1/E2) Kitchen + attached Utility zone (bottom-center/right in plan) are not represented as a distinct room cluster in 3D; central space reads as continuous living/dining. (E2) Bathroom/toilet block locations and their relationship to bedrooms/corridor do not match plan (left-side toilets and central/right toilet appear re-partitioned). (E2/E3) Door locations and orientations are largely incorrect/undefined (most openings have no clear hinged orientation matching the plan). (E4) Room proportions differ: living/dining area is expanded; service core (kitchen/utility/lobby) is compressed/absent; corridors/wall runs do not align to the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural fidelity is low. (E4) Wall alignment and partition geometry do not preserve the plan’s grid/offsets. (E2) Adjacencies are wrong: plan’s kitchen/utility/toilet-1 sequence on the bottom/right side is not maintained; deck adjacency to living is missing. (E1) Missing deck and missing/merged service rooms violate completeness. (E5) Several openings/windows appear added or resized without plan basis. Wall thickness is somewhat consistent visually, but door embedding is not faithful (many door leaves omitted).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not map well to the 2D plan. (E1) Kitchen fixtures (counters/appliances) and utility fittings are missing. (E5) Two dining tables are shown (plan indicates a single dining set) and furniture arrangement does not respect the plan’s intended zoning (living/dining vs kitchen separation). Bedroom furniture is generic and not scaled/placed to match the 2D layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean and readable, with acceptable lighting and geometry. Isometric camera is plausible, though not strictly orthographic. Some clarity issues arise from missing door swings/frames and simplified openings, which reduces architectural legibility. Overall presentation quality is moderate despite fidelity issues.

detected_errors.description: Deck/terrace (top side in 2D plan) is missing in the 3D render; replaced by an exterior wall with windows.
Kitchen and attached Utility rooms (as distinct spaces in the 2D plan) are missing/merged into the main living/dining space in 3D; no kitchen counter/appliance layout present.
Toilet/bathroom partitions are misplaced relative to the 2D plan; the left-side toilet stack and the central/right toilet positions do not align with the plan.
Lobby/entry organization and corridor geometry do not match the 2D plan; internal wall runs are shifted.
Door placement/orientation is incorrect or unspecified: many openings lack door leaves and do not match the plan’s hinged swing positions.
Window placement is inconsistent with the plan: plan emphasizes large openings to deck/balconies; 3D adds/relocates windows on exterior walls without matching the 2D layout.

Proportions are distorted: living/dining area appears oversized while service core (kitchen/utility/lobby) is reduced or absent; several room dimensions do not visually correspond to labeled sizes in the plan.
Hallucinated/unsupported interior elements: an extra dining table and some window/opening sizes appear not grounded in the 2D plan.
